#summary Describes this project.

= Introduction =

This project contains a collection of components/composites that are too small or simple to be contained within their own project/system. They are used by other projects in the oppna-program suite.


= Details =

These are the components contained within this project. Follow the links to se more details about every components.

 * [commons_util_core_bc_composite_svc_ldap LDAP client]
 * [commons_util_core_bc_composite_svc_pivotaltracker Pivotal Tracker Client]
 * [commons_util_core_bc_composite_svc_usd USD client]
 * [commons_util_core_bc_composite_types_jpa JPA Framework]
